Articles.Content: My kerbin return from their bold adventure to the planet Eve under command of Jeb Kerman:D

Wow! The fastest re entry I've gotten was 3.2 km/s starting from 10,00 km (just shy of the MÃƒÂ¼n) Preforming a high speed reentry test of bobcats Orion spacecraft. What's with the 10 minutes of blackness after you land? One other thing, one chute seriously? You need atleast 2.
It looks like the 10 minutes of blackness is to allow the music to finish....
My fastest Kerbin aerocapture was at 6000 m/s coming in from Jool, and it was a BIG ship too.

My fastest Kerbin aerocapture was at 6000 m/s coming in from Jool, and it was a BIG ship too.

I had something around 8 km/s. It was laythe.

Going retrograde.
I guess this has started a competition for the highest re-entry speed.. Also what is up with the last 10 min on the vid just for the song?
My fastest was too fast, it was going way faster than escape velocity of earth. I was coming in at 16km/s so I had to set my periapsis to <5 km to ensure I was captured. I still go to go to Minmus.
This makes me want to set an Orion into a retrograte Laythe intercept somehow.
